name: Gallery in the Dune
description: Below the dune is the former pyramid that was built up billion years ago. In order to remember the lesson, we rebuilt the pyramid on the old site and called it the Gallery in the Dune. The most frightening ability of sand is that it can easily wipe out all civilizations, like the last that our predecessors did. This time, we should not repeat the past tragedy. This time is our turn. let's jump and look up the Gallery.
